channel.description: Recent content in music on David John Baker

item.title: Cataloging Memories with Music
item.description: The past few times that I have sat down to work on my dissertation I have run into a writer’s block. Though it is not the kind of writer’s block where nothing comes out. The past few times I have set aside time to write I have had so many thoughts that I have not been able to just stick my nose to the ground and write. My brain feel like it’s on fire.
